node.html: Built a real-time face mask detection system for organizations, combining CNN with TensorFlow and OpenCV, supporting Covid-19 safety protocols.
Engineered an IoT-based system with Arduino to monitor a baby's surroundings, using sensors and GSM module for real-time parental alerts.
Crafted a Tetris game using React, enhancing gameplay with custom hooks and Styled Components, hosted on GCP ensuring high availability.
Developed a web app that recognizes handwritten mathematical equations, solves them, and displays the results, utilizing Convolutional Neural Networks.
Developed an interactive car game in Python using the Pygame library, featuring advanced collision detection and dynamic gameplay.
Developed a full-stack virtual art gallery, facilitating art transactions and featuring an intuitive exploration page, built with HTML, CSS, PHP, and MySQL.
Created a content-based movie recommendation engine using NLP techniques, leveraging cosine similarity for personalized suggestions.
Created an Android app for blood donation that integrates real-time data management using Google Cloud Functions and enhances connectivity through Firebase and Google Maps API.

frontmatter.title: SBERT-Based MLOps for News Search Engine Deployment

node.html: Implemented a Flask-based semantic search engine for news articles, integrating SBERT and ANNOY, and optimized with Docker on AWS, improving search precision and user engagement.
Developed a Next.js 13 web application, using TypeScript and Firebase, to mimic ChatGPT interactions, enhanced with dynamic routing and Google Authentication.
